chapter.name: FrameLib Tutorial 4: Getting In and Out of FrameLib
chapter.header: Framelib Tutorial 4: Getting In and Out of FrameLib
chapter.subhead: Methods for converting data between Max and FrameLib
chapter.body: FrameLib operates using a unique kind of frame-based data. Similar, to converting between signal-rate and control-rate data, FrameLib has mechanisms for moving between the FrameLib and Max domains. This tutorial will guide you through all the scenarios where you'll need to know this, and how you can perform these conversions.
